name: Idle Dargons Think of Treasure (DargsyWargon)
description:
Welcome to Idle Dargons Think of Treasure! An Idle/Clicker game where you collect as many shinies as possible. What are shinies? Shinies are coins, gems, gold, anything with value and shine. Dargons love collecting shinies, and they need your help to get as much as you
can so they have something to back up their new kingdom with.

The game is simple. Begin by clicking the treasure chest to get shinies. Once you have some, you will be able to begin bringing in Dargons which will help you collect shinies. After getting more, you will have access to more upgrades which will allow you to gain more shinies in a vicious cycle of shiny collecting and upgrades. Eventually, the process will begin to slow down and you will need to use the powerful meteor gloves to reset everything and gain access to powerful multipliers. Each time you reset, the process will become faster and faster until your shiny production is through the roof!

Idle Dargons Think of Treasure also features 124 achievements which will keep you busy for a long time.

Enjoy your time, take in the hand drawn graphics, and help Dargonia become the richest kingdom in all of the land!
